title: Prioritize Development of Automated Agent Pre-Deployment Testing Suite

reasoning.problem: Develop and deploy a rigorous, automated pre-deployment testing suite for all agents, leveraging Wolfram's capabilities in symbolic programming, automated theorem proving, and system modeling. This suite should address the AgentGladiator instability and prevent continuous failures in the operational environment. Prioritize automated system validation and incorporate failure prediction based on historical data, where available. Focus on early detection of code flaws to ensure system stability and prevent systemic risks.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
